trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.DoWork" /> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.DoWork" /> 事件處理常式的資料。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DoWorkEventArgs> class to handle the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.DoWork> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DoWorkEventArgs>類別處理<xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.DoWork>事件。

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Run an Operation in the Background](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-run-an-operation-in-the-background.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需完整的程式碼清單，請參閱[How to： 在背景執行作業](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-run-an-operation-in-the-background.md)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an argument for an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定非同步作業的引數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DoWorkEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DoWorkEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the argument of an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示非同步作業的引數。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing the argument of an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示非同步作業的引數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DoWorkEventArgs> class to handle the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.DoWork> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DoWorkEventArgs>類別處理<xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.DoWork>事件。

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Run an Operation in the Background](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-run-an-operation-in-the-background.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需完整的程式碼清單，請參閱[How to： 在背景執行作業](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-run-an-operation-in-the-background.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the result of an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示非同步作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing the result of an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示非同步作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DoWorkEventArgs> class to handle the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.DoWork> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DoWorkEventArgs>類別處理<xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.DoWork>事件。

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Run an Operation in the Background](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-run-an-operation-in-the-background.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需完整的程式碼清單，請參閱[How to： 在背景執行作業](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-run-an-operation-in-the-background.md)。
